title: 2019 EMEA Regional Leadership Briefing Opportunites: Regional Outlook Remains Subdued Relative to 2018
body:
Dublin, Oct.  09, 2019  (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- The     "EMEA Regional Leadership Briefing"   report has been 
added to     ResearchAndMarkets.com's  offering.             OverviewThe macroeconomic outlook for the region 
remains subdued relative to 2018, but opportunities still exist, from greater social spending by governments across 
the region to changes in China's Belt and Road Initiative that could create opportunities for MNCs to be more 
involved in projects than they were in the past- Companies need to keep in mind that while some economic stimulus 
in China and less tightening of monetary policy by developed-market central banks will support the outlook for the 
year, they will only prevent further deterioration in economic conditions - they will not necessarily create significant 
impetus for demand growth- Additionally, political risks - from within and from outside of Europe, the Middle East, 
and Africa - will create potential volatility that will continue to shape the region during the course of the year- 
Companies need to invest in their competitiveness and value proposition across markets, prepare for a more 
challenging environment with weaker demand growth, and actively navigate political risks in the months 
ahead.What you will learn

• The impact that significant global events will have on the region

• Emerging opportunities in EMEA through 2019

• Actions for multinationals to take to win in the region

What you will receive

• Immediate access to the 15-page PDF report

• Exclusive email updates covering emerging markets business topics

• Special discounts on future report purchases
